response.original_title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
response.overview: A highly intelligent chimpanzee named Caesar has been living a peaceful suburban life ever since he was born. But when he gets taken to a cruel primate facility, Caesar decides to revolt against those who have harmed him.
response.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
